title: Model Railways - Right Track 14 - Wagons 2
description:
Right Track 14 - Wagons Part 2 [H265, Random002] 1Hr:45


Since these DVDs are not available anymore, remember there are others like you who would like this material so PLEASE SEED ;-)


Improving the quality of your freight stock is a quick and inexpensive operation that doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t call for stratospheric modelling skills. In a couple of evenings (or less) you can transform an out-of-the-box or kit-built model into something really special . . .

Over the years Iain Rice has built, modified and generally upgraded many hundreds of wagons. In this DVD presentation he passes on the skills heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s acquired in his usual accessible and highly entertaining fashion. He shows you how to enhance your wagon fleet by using whitemetal kits and readily available detailing components, how to modify your stock to reflect prototype variations and how to add realistic loads Ã¢â‚¬â€œ after all, carrying goods and minerals is what freight operations are all about. He talks in depth about painting and weathering and gives some useful hands-on advice about improving how your wagons run on your layout.


Important: Resolution = 768 x 576. However, I have encoded these from 8GB to a reasonable uploading size, so there will be the odd loss of definition here and there.
I used the H265 format, so if you have difficulty playing this file I suggest you download a media player like VLC
